testimonial.heading: What Our Users Say
testimonial.description: Join countless users who are amazed by their fractal creations

items.name: Emily Carter
items.comment: I can't believe how easy it is to create stunning fractals! The process is fast and the results are breathtaking.

items.name: Daniel Lee
items.comment: This tool has transformed my digital art projects. The fractals are mesmerizing and incredibly intricate.

items.name: Anna Smith
items.comment: I love how I can customize every aspect of my fractals. It’s like having a personal art studio at my fingertips!

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about the AI Fractal Generator

items.title: What types of fractals can be generated?
items.description: Our generator can produce a variety of fractal types including Mandelbrot sets, Julia sets, and more, with customizable parameters for endless variety.

items.title: Is there a limit on fractal generation?
items.description: Absolutely not! You can generate as many fractals as you like without any restrictions.

items.title: Can I use the fractals for commercial projects?
items.description: Yes! Users can freely use generated fractals for both personal and commercial projects without any licensing issues.

items.title: How does privacy work with fractal generation?
items.description: All data processed remains local and never leaves your browser. Your parameters and generated fractals are kept private and secure.

footer.heading: Ready to Create Stunning Fractals?
footer.description: Try WaveSpeed AI now and bring your fractal visions to life. No sign-up required.
